oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Country Music Hall of Fame induction press conference - 2001
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Press conference announcing the 2001 inductees to the Country Music Hall of Fame. Held in the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on October 13, 2001
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ken Nelson; Bill Anderson; Gordon Stoker; Ray Walker; Sam Phillips; Bill Anderson; Phil Everly; Charlie Louvin;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Press conference announcing the 2001 inductees to the Country Music Hall of Fame. Inductees present are Ken Nelson, Gordon Stoker and Ray Walker of the Jordanaires, Charlie Louvin of the Louvin Brothers, Phil Everly of the Everly Brothers, Sam Phillips and Bill Anderson. Inductees also include Don Gibson, Homer and Jethro, Waylon Jennings, Don Law, Webb Pierce.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.); Phillips, Sam, 1923-2003; Louvin, Charlie, 1927-2011; Everly, Phil, 1939-2014; Anderson, Bill, 1937-; Nelson, Ken, 1911-2008; Stoker, Gordon, 1924-2013; Walker, Ray, 1934-;
